dcterms:creator: Alessandro T Gifford
Kshitij Dwivedi
Gemma Roig
Radoslaw M Cichy
dcterms:description: The ThingsEEG dataset comprises extensive EEG recordings gathered through a rapid serial visual presentation (RSVP) paradigm, featuring responses from 10 individuals to 16,740 natural images from the THINGS database. The dataset includes 1654 training classes, each with 10 images, and 200 test classes, each with 1 image.
dcterms:title: ThingsEEG dataset

dcterms:creator: Martin N Hebart
Adam H Dickter
Alexis Kidder
Wan Y Kwok
Anna Corriveau
Caitlin Van Wicklin
Chris I Baker
dcterms:description: The THINGS database contains 1,854 object concepts and more than 26,000 naturalistic object images, providing a rich resource for visual recognition tasks.
dcterms:title: THINGS database
